name: Ojama!
author: DonMega
notes: The plan was to get KOG with holy guard   Amazons. A losing streak to God milling  sylvans threw a wrench into that.  Blew the dust off this classic and didn't drop a single match to sylvans.Take damage clog front and back row you win.   Four losses on the climb SSA, mill , and two spellbooks.  Easy climb.
